name: St. George Island State Park
description: Surrounded by hills, this upmarket resort is 3 km from Pushkar Lake, 4 km from the 14th-century Brahma Temple and 10 km from the Ajmer Sharif Dargah pilgrimage site. Featuring wood floors, polished rooms offer free Wi-Fi, flat-screen TVs, safes and minibars, along with tea and coffeemaking facilities. Upgraded rooms add balconies or terraces. Room service is available 24/7. A free breakfast buffet is served in an informal pavilion-style restaurant that has floor-to-ceiling windows and scenic views. There's also a bar, and an open-air cafe/bar by an outdoor pool, plus a spa, a gym and a game room.
